p: The next day, cells were incubated at room temperature with anti-cleaved Caspase-3 primary antibody (Cell Signaling Technology, Danvers, MA, USA) diluted 1:100 in incubation buffer. After 1 h the antibody was removed and the cells were suspended in PBS for data acquisition with Becton Dickinson LSR II Flow Cytometer (BD Bioscience) and analysis using Flowing software.
